name: express-server
description: An express js backend for my react vite app.

scripts.start: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("newrelic/esm-loader.mjs", pathToFileURL("./"));' dist/index.js
scripts.dev: nodemon --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("newrelic/esm-loader.mjs", pathToFileURL("./"));' --exec tsx src/index.ts
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: SENTRY_LOG_LEVEL=debug sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org zone-delivery-services --project node-express ./dist && SENTRY_LOG_LEVEL=debug sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org zone-delivery-services --project node-express ./dist

author: Najaf Sikander
